welcome.title: Welcome to Angus API!
welcome.description: Here you and your team can complete the following work:
features: Manage projects, services, APIs and test tasks;
Conduct API functional testing, performance testing and stability testing to ensure delivery of stable systems that meet business requirements.

debug.title: Debug API
debug.description: Edit and debug APIs online quickly.

addProject.title: Add Project/Service
addProject.description: Organize APIs through projects or services, projects can contain multiple services (such as microservices) and APIs, services can only contain APIs.

import.title: Import Service from File
import.description: Import OpenAPI or Postman API YAML files or JSON files.

configuration.syncDescription: Automatically import external OpenAPI to current {type}
configuration.securityDescription: Define security schemes (Authorization) that can be used by all APIs under current {type}
configuration.serverDescription: Define servers (Server URL) that can be used by all APIs under current project/service
configuration.performanceDescription: Set default performance metrics for APIs under {type}, performance metrics will affect performance test pass rate; if you want to set performance metrics for a specific API separately, you can set it in API performance configuration
configuration.shareDescription: Through sharing, you can authorize others to view API documentation and debug APIs within a specified time
configuration.variablesDescription: Through defining variables, you can reuse a parameter value or control condition execution

serverConfig.title: Server Configuration
serverConfig.hints: Define servers (Server URL) that can be used by all APIs under current service, maximum 50 servers can be added.

messages.configError: Server configuration error, please check and correct before saving.
messages.serverUrlExists: Server URL already exists, please re-enter
messages.variableNotRepeat: Variables in Server URL cannot be repeated

form.urlPlaceholder: URL prefix pointing to target host, e.g.: https://{env}.xcan.cloud:{prot}/{path}

tips.variableValueNotRepeat: Values of the same variable cannot be duplicated

tips.serviceStatusChange: Modifying service status will synchronously modify the status of all APIs under the service.
tips.servicePublish: Publishing a service will publish all APIs under the service. Published services and APIs cannot be modified or saved.
tips.apiPublish: After publishing an API, the basic information and parameter information of the API cannot be modified or saved

syncConfig.title: Sync Configuration
syncConfig.hints: Automatically import external OpenAPI to current service, maximum 10 configurations allowed.

messages.noValidConfig: No valid sync configuration found, please save data first
messages.dataNotSaved: Data not saved, please save data or cancel editing first

form.name: Name
form.deleteWhenNotExist: Whether to delete local APIs when sync APIs do not exist
form.authRequired: Required when sync address is protected. Maximum 10 allowed.

hints.main: Tags serve as additional metadata for APIs to group them. An API can have multiple tags, meaning it belongs to multiple groups. The order of tag definitions will be consistent with the order of APIs grouped by tags and the order of interface display in documentation.
hints.sub: Each tag name must be unique; not all interfaces need to be associated with tags; maximum 2000 tags can be added.

messages.dataNotSaved: Data not saved, please save data or cancel editing first
